definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
to respect Gods and demons from a distance (idiom); to remain at a respectful distance
pinyin: jing4 gui3 shen2 er2 yuan3 zhi1

definition: foxes, ghosts and immortals/supernatural beings, usually fictional

sentences.english: In the works of Confucius, afterlife, ghost and deity were seldom mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子的著作中很少提及来世和鬼神。

sentences.english: The custom of elaborate funeral was popular during the Han Dynasty due to people's belief in the existence of gods and ghosts and filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 对鬼神的迷信和孝观念的盛行使两汉兴起了厚葬之风。

sentences.english: In ancient time, the Yin people deeply believed the religion of ghosts and gods.
sentences.chinese: 在上古时代，殷人信仰鬼神的宗教观念最为浓厚。

sentences.english: The hobgoblins are a popular theme in literature.
sentences.chinese: 鬼神是文学中常见的题材。

sentences.english: It is meant to frighten off evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 目的是想吓走阴魂鬼神。

sentences.english: I knew every spot where a murder or robbery had been committed, or a ghost seen.
sentences.chinese: 我知道那里的每一处杀人越货之所与鬼神出没之地。

sentences.english: We have no startled day sob ghosts and gods, but meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有惊天泣鬼神，却有无微不至的关心问候。

sentences.english: Hero, who is also indescribably tragic.
sentences.chinese: 英雄者，惊天地泣鬼神是也。

sentences.english: In some words, the ghost culture inFengdu is declining.
sentences.chinese: 总之，丰都鬼神文化正在衰落。

sentences.english: Third, ghosts and gods are the Qi's attribute.
sentences.chinese: 鬼神则是气在太虚状态下的属性。

sentences.english: Folk deities and God-man worship become the major content of folk literature.
sentences.chinese: 民间鬼神与神人崇拜信仰是民间文学创作的重要内容。

sentences.english: The love between the sisters, still can be amazing.
sentences.chinese: 姐妹之间的爱，照样可以惊天地泣鬼神。

sentences.english: There are plenty of bad theologies around us today.
sentences.chinese: 在我们四周围有很多坏鬼神学。

sentences.english: King of spirits, and well, it was such a smart approach.
sentences.chinese: 敬鬼神而远之，这是多么有智能的做法。

sentences.english: This is what they deliver him.
Most Taiwanese shamans impute the cause of disease to spiritual beings or supernatural forces.
sentences.chinese: 童乩大多将病因归咎于鬼神或超自然力量。

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to respect Gods and demons from a distance (idiom); to remain at a respectful distance
pinyin: jing4 gui3 shen2 er2 yuan3 zhi1

definition: arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)
